comments.comment: Api kataragama gia 2019 january wala 26 wenida.apita raa sanjewa kiala kolek hamu una stf eke kialai kiuwe . Pasuda ude ohu apiwa ape wahane nagala situl pauwata aran gia.mage duwa wa saha puthala dennawa.duwage wayasa 20. Puthala dennage wayasa 10 ,12.mage wayasa 50. Ohu apita eda dawase guide kenek ha samanawa udau kara.katharagama town eksta apiwa genath bassuwa sithul pauwe idala. Api ta kisi ma karadarayak kare na... ganu lamek ekka man gie.. ohuta tibba ape ran badu aran ape car1 th aran paninna. Eth ehema kare naha.mama eth eyagen ahuwa oyata apiwa mankolla kanda th tibba neda kiala ape gamana nima wela.ohu kiuwa mama ehama wada karana kenek nemei kiala. Api ohuta sulu taagak dela stuti kara apiwa paresamn genawa ta town ekata kaale asse idala .. . Me kari sakkili 4 dena wage nemei a kolla.. oba meka dakinawa nam mata call karanna. Me siddiya daka gaman apita ohuwa matak una.colamba idala api tanien kataragama aawe. Ohu apiwa maha kale ta ekkan gehen ali th pennuwa.. a kolla ta budusarai.. me ponayo 4 ta nam hena ma gahai...handi gaavila palayan ..bijje pilikaa 4k hadila marenna one ojus galala..ponayo 4ta

comments.comment: Dawasak matat mehema deyak wenna giya me horu tikamada danne ne. Mamai mage loku Amma kenekui pare bus ekak enakam hitiya hawasa 6,30 welawa medical center eke doctor kenek chanal karala tibuna 7ta weddi hospital ekata yanna tibune itin Api denna pare iddi sudu car ekak giya tikak israhata gihilla aye. Pitipssata show eke avilla api issarahin nahara kara. Loku Amma hitiye issarala wenna man tikak passe hitiye phone eka balamin. Ara Minissu loku Amma ekka Katha karanawa man ahagena hitiye. Issaraha dennai pitipasset dennek wage man dakka vahane Glas arala tibune. Un Katha kare apita e wahaneta naginna kiyala. Kurunegata dagena yannam kiyala. Ara loku Amma kiuwa be kiyala eth ahanne ne. Un loku amma ekka Katha karata as tibune mage diha man dakka. Passe piti passe hitipu ekek kiuwa naginna ammat ekka api gihin dannam Dan re wela bus ne kiyala. Passe man kiuwa me pare bus one tharam tiyanawa bus eke ennam kiyala. Eth ahanne man tikak issarahata avilla kiuwa. Poddak inna man 119 gahala Poddak danuwat karanna one. Loku amme wahane number eka kiyanna kiyala. Man eka kiuwa vitharai wahane eka parata panagannagena giya. Mage loku ammata 56 k wenawa wayasa Mata 27 eda apit nanganam wenne me tika thama
